properties.name: littlecode.setup.database.auto-apply
properties.description: Enable application of script to the database

properties.name: littlecode.setup.database.target.auto-start
properties.description: Enable autostart for target ddl script generation

properties.name: littlecode.setup.database.target.databases
properties.description: List of Database types to export ddl scripts

properties.name: littlecode.setup.database.target.tags
properties.description: List of tags to ddl scripts generation, ex: schemas, tables, ...

properties.name: littlecode.setup.database.ddl.auto-start
properties.description: Enable autostart for ddl script generation

properties.name: littlecode.setup.database.ddl.auto-save
properties.description: Enable disk save for ddl script

properties.name: littlecode.setup.database.ddl.safe-drops
properties.description: Enable inclusion of drops in DLL scripts

properties.name: littlecode.setup.business.auto-start
properties.description: Enabled autostart triggers to setup operations
